liquibase.CompositeFileOpener

liquibase.CompositeFileOpener Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for liquibase.CompositeFileOpener:
[legend]

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A FileOpener that will search in a List of other FileOpeners until it finds one that has a resource of the appropriate name and path.

Author:
<a href="mailto:csuml@yahoo.co.uk>Paul Keeble

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

liquibase.CompositeFileOpener.CompositeFileOpener ( List< FileOpener >  openers  ) 

Creates a Composite Opener with the list specified.

The List will be searched in order from beginning to end.

Parameters:
openers The list of Openers to use

Member Function Documentation

InputStream liquibase.CompositeFileOpener.getResourceAsStream ( String  file  )  throws IOException

Searches through all of the FileOpeners in order for the file.

If none of the FileOpeners was able to produce a stream to the file then null is returned.

Implements liquibase.FileOpener.

Definition at line 42 of file CompositeFileOpener.java.

00042                                                                            {
00043         for (FileOpener o : openers) {
00044             InputStream is = o.getResourceAsStream(file);
00045             if (is != null)
00046                 return is;
00047         }
00048         return null;
00049     }

Enumeration<URL> liquibase.CompositeFileOpener.getResources ( String  packageName  )  throws IOException

Searches all of the FileOpeners for a directory named packageName.

If no results are found within any of the directories then an empty Enumeration is returned.

Implements liquibase.FileOpener.

Definition at line 56 of file CompositeFileOpener.java.

00061         }
